Author: ClearPoll
Title: [ANN]ClearPoll - Decentralised Public Opinion - Earn Crypto for Creating Polls
Body: CLEARPOLL BETA IS NOW AVAIABLE TO DOWNLOAD from the Google Play Store for Android. (iOS coming soon).  DOWNLOAD HERE : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.nextechdevelopments.clearpollB  ClearPoll uses POLL TOKEN as it's Cryptocurrency. POLL available from KuCoin, Cryptopia and ForkDelta  ClearPoll is a social public opinion poll app, using blockchain technology to decentralise votes and poll results. This means that nobody can manipulate, censor or remove your votes.  ClearPoll allows you to search for any topic you like, or even create your own topics, and cast your vote. It's the best way to have your say.  Currently in beta stage, we'll be adding more features and improvements constantly until the full public launch on August 31.  Beta features include: ‚Ä¢ Search for polls by keyword or category ‚Ä¢ Create your own polls quickly and easily ‚Ä¢ Vote on active polls ‚Ä¢ Browse all historical poll results ‚Ä¢ Track polls you've voted on or created ‚Ä¢ Create username ‚Ä¢ Connect with friends by searching their username ‚Ä¢ Share your votes on your social feed ‚Ä¢ View your friends' votes on the social feed ‚Ä¢ View Star Polls and follow real stars (real stars coming on launch) ‚Ä¢ Filter poll results by local, national or global ‚Ä¢ Create private polls with a 4 digit pin code to vote ‚Ä¢ View live poll results ‚Ä¢ Browse trending, social and random polls ‚Ä¢ Blockchain ensures results are not manipulated or hacked ‚Ä¢ Connect with your phone then use on tablet or second device  Many more features coming soon including: ‚Ä¢ Rewards system - earn poll tokens for using the app! ‚Ä¢ Compete against other users for total monthly points ‚Ä¢ ClearPoll Plus ‚Ä¢ Sponsored polls ‚Ä¢ Star Polls with real stars ‚Ä¢ Widgets ‚Ä¢ ClearPoll Ratings Bars - world first blockchain ratings widget ‚Ä¢ ClearPoll Advertising Network ‚Ä¢ ClearPoll Desktop ‚Ä¢ Much more!  NOTE: All data including usernames and account history will be removed after Beta testing, before full launch on August 31.  For Beta testing feedback please email info@clearpoll.io  DOWNLOAD HERE : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.nextechdevelopments.clearpollB  https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DiZpPj6W0AI3fdy.jpg

Author: cryptoman2.0
Title: [ANN]ClearPoll - Decentralised Public Opinion - Earn Crypto for Creating Polls
Body: $1.14 USD THIS PROJECT IS SO UNDERVALUED, This project is (in my opinion(, a real gem, in a ocean of scams, (shit coins, and shilled shit)  If this project get some attention by bigger investers this token will go up so quick, (due to low market cap, coin numbers) that it could 100x in a week, easy. some whale drops 50 BTC buys up all the trading on the open market, it goes up to $100 a coin over night. 2 Blockchain Projects, 1 Token.  Total Supply: 8,999,992 POLL Circulating Supply: 6,999,991 POLL ICO Price: 10c ‚Äì 12c ICO Results: Hard cap reached, October 20 2017. ClearPoll is a social public opinion poll network, using blockchain technology to secure votes and poll results. Users can browse polls across any topic, vote easily, and view realtime results.  ClearPoll users earn POLL tokens as rewards for creating great polls, or voting on sponsored polls. 50% of all ClearPoll revenue goes back to user rewards!  ClearPoll includes a lot of awesome extra features such as Star Polls (celebrities can poll their fans), Sponsored Polls and live media polls, for realtime polls on TV or other live entertainment. ‚úì World‚Äôs first decentralized public opinion poll network ‚úì Experienced Australian based team ‚úì Featured in Forbes Magazine ‚úì Hard cap reached during ICO ‚úì Users earn POLL token rewards for using the app ‚úì POLL tokens required to access corporate services ‚úì Partnerships and endorsements coming soon ‚úì Alpha out now, full launch in August!  Clearify is a brilliant new solution to the problem of scammers and errors when sending crypto.  We verify that ICO teams are who they say they are. They are then given access to a secure space on the blockchain, where they can paste in all of their official crypto receiving addresses.  Their customers can then search the crypto payment address they have been given, via the Clearify website or browser plugin. Since only the real, genuine seller has access to the space, and only they could have added the address, the seller will be 100% sure nobody has intercepted the transaction and provided a fake address. ‚úì Launched January 17th ‚úì Clearify service endorsed by Binance CEO and John McAfee ‚úì Market leader for ICO address verifications ‚úì Partnered with and fully integrated into icoalert.com ‚úì Bonus scam address flagging system built in ‚úì Experienced Australian based team ‚úì All ICO Alert featured listings to use Clearify in future! ‚úì Over 130 ICOs already verified ‚úì POLL tokens used to purchase verifications and promotional services. Check out Clearify.io Telegram

Author: ClearPoll
Title: [ANN]ClearPoll - Decentralised Public Opinion - Earn Crypto for Creating Polls
Body: Hi everyone - apologies for the lack of response on Bitcointalk - we have been on Telegram every day, and very active on Twitter. In future we will be updating this thread far more regularly and answering questions.  Re: Github - ClearPoll is not open source. Our code is not public, but we are looking to have it independently evaluated prior to launch, just to prove it does what we say it does. The alpha is very basic, missing all the cool features that will be included on launch including Star Polls, private polls, sponsored polls, location based polls and of course the big one - Rewards!  Thanks for your interest and support, if you ever need a quick response to a question, Telegram is always the best option as we have people there 24/7.

Author: ClearPoll
Title: [ANN]ClearPoll - Decentralised Public Opinion - Earn Crypto for Creating Polls
Body: We‚Äôve been so busy lately building the ClearPoll platform that sometimes it‚Äôs easy to lose sight of our original vision‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääthe whole point of ClearPoll. So I thought it would be beneficial to try and ‚Äúzoom out‚Äù for a while and remind you all why we ClearPoll needs to exist.  I have read some comments recently suggesting that some people don‚Äôt yet understand the whole purpose or benefit of ClearPoll. Someone said today that it doesn‚Äôt need a blockchain. Someone else questioned how it‚Äôs better than other social media polls. So let me remind you all of what our vision actually is.  ClearPoll will give everyone an equal voice. It is a space where all are welcome. No favouritism, no censorship, no moderation. A truly fair, transparent and widely accessible way to vote on any topic, at any time, and have that vote secured with blockchain technology where it cannot be manipulated. As you know we are in the process of approaching stars and influencers to use our platform. We should make it very clear, we do not endorse any particular personalities on our platform. ClearPoll is for everyone. Some polls may even be offensive or confronting to some people. ClearPoll only works if everyone is equally represented. We will not pick and choose our users or stars . We have an ‚Äúall welcome‚Äù policy. If we were selective, we would be no better than other platforms who heavily moderate ‚Äúfree speech‚Äù.  https://cdn-images-1.medium.com/max/1600/1*-rN7ZdMibrUuFxUzrdhOcw.jpeg  Our long term vision for ClearPoll is to be the go-to place to share public opinion. After launch we will continue to develop the platform and create a place to not only vote, but to discuss topics and polls and really try and tap into what people want, and why they want it. Some people think that if the option they voted for was not in the majority, that other voters are ‚Äúwrong‚Äù. Nobody is wrong, they are all entitled to their opinion and there are always reasons why they voted the way they did. This is why we do not hide any historical polls. An unexpected or unfavourable result for one person, may not be for another. If we give full access to all polls ever completed, it is fair for all users.  Now a little about our blockchain. There seems to be some confusion about ClearPoll tokens, as they are an ERC20 token. The tokens are separate to our blockchain. They are integrated into the platform in the form of rewards and also purchasing corporate services, but they are not used in the blockchain itself. Our blockchain is a fully custom built solution specifically designed for our needs. We don‚Äôt often speak about our blockchain on a technical level because we aren‚Äôt here to compete with other chains‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääit was designed specifically to power ClearPoll and it works perfectly.  Lead blockchain developer Adrian Daluz says:  It‚Äôs an Ethereum-like blockchain using a trust based proof of stake model for consensus without using POLL tokens for staking. It‚Äôs highly scalable, asynchronous and has an open ledger with full access nodes. Another question we‚Äôve had recently is in regards to privacy and data handling (specifically the new GDPR requirements). ClearPoll includes an option to ‚Äúbe forgotten‚Äù by allowing a user to delete their profile permanently. How is this possible? Profiles (usernames, age, gender etc) are not stored on the blockchain. Votes are stored on the chain, not profiles. When a user deletes their profile, their votes remain as a +1 on that particular poll, with no profile attached. On top of that, we never ask for identifiable data such as name, date of birth, address or email address and we will never make any personal data available to anyone, at any time. Our ClearPoll Plus advanced poll results are statistical, cumulative data. Nobody can see specifically which profile voted and nobody can access a user‚Äôs profile to view their voting history. The only time your vote will ever be visible, is if you choose to share your vote with your friends. Entirely optional. In summary, your profile data is not accessible to anyone unless you choose to share your activity, and you can delete your profile entirely at any time.  Anyone can vote on anything, any time. Nobody can tamper with the votes or results. All historical polls are viewable. No profiles are stored on the blockchain, only votes. All are welcome. I hope this clears up some recent questions and concerns. We are always available in Telegram should you have any more questions.  Thanks again for the support. Very exciting times ahead!  Daniel Abela CoFounder ClearPoll

Body: Dev Release!  ClearPoll App user interface on device!  https://www.clearpoll.io/clearpoll-app-user-interface-on-device-demonstration/  We‚Äôve been busy as usual, and managed to video some of our progress on the ClearPoll app.  The following video shows choosing a poll, voting on it, and live poll results updating across multiple devices.  The look and feel is not 100% final, but close. The general clean, flat design is going to remain, but we‚Äôll be adding more features, functionality and a little bit of ‚Äúlife‚Äù to the experience.  Check out the video and you‚Äôll see we are making big strides towards launch day. Only one month until Alpha is released for testing!   PLUS We are listing on a new exchange. We will announce which one soon, but many of our token holders are going to be very happy.

Author: ClearPoll
Title: [ANN]ClearPoll - Decentralised Public Opinion - Earn Crypto for Creating Polls
Body: Development Update:  The ClearPoll Blockchain is 3X Faster!  It‚Äôs time to release an update on the progress of our blockchain development.  The following is an update from our lead blockchain developer, Adrian Daluz:  ‚ÄúWe spent some time working on our transaction and mining algorithms to increase speed without lowering difficulty or security. We‚Äôve managed to run a single node at 7,000 transactions a second across the globe, which is a 3x speed increase from the base speeds we were seeing originally. To do this, we added asynchronous transactions and consensus so that no large amount of traffic stops the chain in its tracks, something standard blockchains struggle with on a daily basis. This means we can serve more votes faster and give us a larger scalability.‚Äù  So in summary, our blockchain is amazing, and is perfect for our needs. We‚Äôll be able to cope with the high volume we expect to generate.  We‚Äôve gone live on HitBTC, so if you missed out on the token sale, you can secure your POLL now: https://hitbtc.com/exchange/POLL-to-BTC

Author: ClearPoll
Title: [ANN]ClearPoll - Decentralised Public Opinion - Earn Crypto for Creating Polls
Body: https://i.imgur.com/f8C0bC0.png  NOW LAUNCHED - ClearPoll is a decentralised public opinion poll network, using our own blockchain technology to secure votes and poll results.  The problem ClearPoll solves is manipulation and censorship of real, genuine public opinion data. Currently, the media and corporations are able to fabricate poll results to suit their agenda. ClearPoll completely opens up the public opinion process, offering full transparency. Every single poll ever created is viewable and searchable. Users can vote on anything, any time, and create their own polls.  The ClearPoll Token (POLL) Users earn POLL tokens as rewards for votes their polls receive, or for voting on sponsored polls. 50% of ClearPoll revenue is given back to the users, according to their monthly app usage performance. Users earn reward multipliers by holding POLL tokens! POLL was around 10-12c at ICO, which reached hard cap in October. It is now trading on Kucoin and Cryptopia (as well as some other DEX options). ATH has been just over $11 (x100) in January 2018.  The Team ClearPoll is a Perth, Australia based team comprising of experienced developers, designers and marketing specialists.  The App ClearPoll is more than just a voting app. It contains so many great features, that you will have to read about them here: https://medium.com/@info_87835/clearpoll-features-an-in-depth-look-631a029ff4bc Some key features include valuable market research tools, and "Star Polls" - a section where stars, celebrities and influencers can poll their followers, giving great exposure to ClearPoll. ClearPoll is already in alpha, in its most basic form, available on Android and iOS. It is a fully operational blockchain voting app, only lacking the features mentioned above.  ClearPoll Has Launched  Android : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.nextechdevelopments.clearpoll  iOS : https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/clearpoll/id1347664374  ClearPoll Desktop : https://web.clearpoll.com/  Summary Sold out ICO Low Cap Very low supply (less than 9M total) Trading on Kucoin and Cryptopia Featured in Forbes Alpha available now Stars coming on board! Launching in full in August 2018  Join our community: Web: https://clearpoll.com Telegram: https://t.me/clearpoll_clearify Twitter: http://twitter.com/voteclearpoll Reddit: http://reddit.com/r/clearpoll Facebook: https://facebook.com/voteclearpoll  Download our Pitch Deck: https://www.clearpoll.io/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/ClearPoll-Deck.pdf  https://i.imgur.com/Itbxp2M.jpg

Author: ClearPoll
Title: [ANN]ClearPoll - Decentralised Public Opinion - Earn Crypto for Creating Polls
Body: In a few different ways. Firstly we will be launching an advanced metrics subscription called ClearPoll Plus. This platform will give individuals or corporations access to all kinds of awesome analytics data on poll results, such as age, gender, location, votes by timeframe etc. This will be a valuable service for journalists, marketing companies etc. This service will be subscription based and paid for only with POLL tokens, creating a demand for the token as well as earning revenue for the company. The data will not be personal data, it will be cumulative data (just like Google Analytics etc).  We will also be offering advertising space, which, as we know from our other apps, can be a very healthy revenue stream with a popular app.  As well as that, we have merchandise sales. Poll-specific merchandise, allowing people to wear their poll results to prove their point that the people have spoken on a particular issue.  Then we have ClearPoll Widgets, which would be free but have an advanced option to customise appearance plus have embed more detailed public data into articles or websites.  Like all social platforms, we rely on a positive user experience. We believe ClearPoll will be the go-to place for people to have their say on important issues. Something that has been difficult to do in an unfiltered way on other platforms.  Please check out the Whitepaper at https://www.clearpoll.io/downloads/ClearPoll-Whitepaper.pdf there is a lot of good info in there about how we plan to develop and expand this project.   Thanks.

Author: ClearPoll
Title: [ANN]ClearPoll - Decentralised Public Opinion - Earn Crypto for Creating Polls
Body: Can you be more specific about how voting can be skewed towards majority opinion? (or how that will be a problem for ClearPoll).  ClearPoll is a platform for people to have their say. The majority aren't always "right" but it's still good to know what the current situation is on various topics. Voters will not be able to view poll results until they have voted, so they won't be tempted to just join the majority.  Not sure if I have interpreted your question correctly?

Author: ClearPoll
Title: [ANN]ClearPoll - Decentralised Public Opinion - Earn Crypto for Creating Polls
Body: Hey guys,  Firstly thanks for your interest in ClearPoll, it has made a difference to us.  NEO was around $18 when we first started to accept it for token sale contributions.  It is now around $31. Which is awesome.  We didn't expect this to happen during our ICO so we set a fixed rate. But it did happen, so now we can see we aren't offering a fair ratio.  We have just changed it to 1 NEO = 275 POLL. Previously it was 170.  We are always trying to be as fair as possible and look after our contributors because without you, we won't be able to produce ClearPoll to its full potential.  All previous contributors will receive the 275 rate, and thanks again for your contributions!  If NEO price falls again, we may adjust the rate back down but not for anyone who has already contributed. Same goes if NEO continues to climb.  Thanks!

Author: ClearPoll
Title: [ANN]ClearPoll - Decentralised Public Opinion - Earn Crypto for Creating Polls
Body: Hey all, apologies for the lack of update here. We've been updating our other social media pages, Website news section and Telegram page every day.  We've got some news! A working basic prototype video, showing multiple mobile accounts voting, blockchain interaction and live poll result updates. This is the core of how ClearPoll works, and it is working perfectly.  https://www.youtube.com/embed/4Fd2WGRyNxk  We have also decided against using Hyperledger, and are creating our own blockchain instead, based on Ethereum.  Token sale is still on, and we have increased the POLL/ETH ratio due to the price of ETH increasing lately. You can now get 2,500 POLL per ETH. That's under 12c per token, for a circulation of likely under 3M.

Author: MMostaza
Title: [ANN]ClearPoll - Decentralised Public Opinion - Earn Crypto for Creating Polls
Body: Hi I have been reading your whitepaper and I have 2 main doubts that are making me step back about your project.  I really like the idea of a Poll using blockchain, and moreover I would like that it was possible to bring this to a higher level for be used in official elections. But my 2 concerns are the following:   - How you will prevent people to vote more than 1 time? As I read you have to be registered as a User to vote with the App. But how to be sure this person is not using different users in the same App or in different Apps?. If you cant ensure people will be able to vote just once in each poll, I don't think governments, markets or journalist will find the App enough accurate to invest on it. Means ClearPoll will not succeed.   - In the team I didn't saw any specialist or with bit of knowledge related with the main aim of the project: to offer transparent and accurate poll results. Without a person like that in the team or some proved external support information, is hard that entities will trust on the ClearPoll results so, again, they will not find the App enough accurate to invest on it.   I hope there is a positive answer about this 2 concerns. And if not, I truly encourage ClearPoll to work in this 2 points to became totally reliable and useful to their main propose.

Author: Lisk_beginner
Title: [ANN]ClearPoll - Decentralised Public Opinion - Earn Crypto for Creating Polls
Body: Very good Job.  You reach the hardcap
